DESCRIPTION: Slacking off in the discard pile and never return to the draw pile.

Select and #yExhaust a certain number of cards in the discard pile. If the #yExhausted card is a #yWorker, add a copy to the draw pile; otherwise, add a #yRabble to the draw pile. Then draw the same amount of cards.
Must lose a certain amount of #yGold to gain the corresponding effect.
When using a card with this keyword but a different name from the last card, #yLayoff #b3.
The card turns into a legendary character, entering the combat with temporary health and special effects. Move to discard pile when switching to another avatar or temporary health is depleted.
Transforms #yWorkers in hand into random #yApostasy cards on enter; Gains [E] during #yApostasy.
Transforms into the #yDick when taking damage.
Deals damage on enter; Permanently increases the damage whenever he takes damage.
#yExhausts half of the #Rabbles in the discard pile on enter, gaining temporary health for each one; All non-0-cost attack cards have the same effect as #yInvite.
Use temporary gold first during battle; Removed at the end of the battle.
